translation.en: [woman over radio] Someone is calling you home...
♪ 'Cause it's another day For you and me in paradise ♪
-[man] Hey, what's up? -Code.
translation.fr:
ROY HARDAWAY
COMMENT SURVIVRE À HOLLYWOOD - J'écoute.
- Code.

translation.en: -Yeah? -It's good to hear your voice.
Holy shit. Lisa?
Are you okay? I haven't heard from you in months.
translation.fr:
Ça va ?
J'ai pas de nouvelles depuis des mois.

translation.en: I was afraid you were dead.
translation.fr: J'avais peur que tu sois morte.

translation.en: [Lisa] I've been up in the woods working on that short film I told you about.
translation.fr:
J'étais dans les bois à travailler
sur le court métrage dont je t'ai parlé.

translation.en: Must have lost track of time.
translation.fr: J'ai dû perdre la notion du temps.

translation.en: Yeah. I know how you get. So you back in New York?
translation.fr:
Oui, je te connais.
Tu es de retour à New York ?

translation.en: I'm an hour outside L.A.
translation.fr: Je suis à une heure de L.A.

translation.en: Wait, what?
Do you know the name Lou Burke?
Lou Burke? Yeah, of course I do.
Apparently, he wants to meet with me.
Lis, that's huge.
Listen, I need a place to crash. Can I use your couch?
translation.fr:
J'ai besoin d'un endroit où dormir.
Je peux utiliser ton canapé ?

translation.en: Are you kidding? Yeah, of course. Anything you need.
translation.fr: Tu plaisantes ? Tout ce que tu veux.

translation.en: I'm at 4837 Traction, downtown.
I knew I could count on you.
translation.fr: Je savais pouvoir compter sur toi.

translation.en: -I'm glad you're not dead. -Me too. See you soon, Code.
translation.fr:
- Content que tu ne sois pas morte.
- Moi aussi. À plus, Code.

translation.en: ♪ I'm the one, natural one, make it easy ♪
[Lisa] How's your band doing? -Heard you're selling drugs now, too. -Shh!
translation.fr:
Ton groupe marche bien ?
On m'a dit que tu vends de la drogue.

translation.en: [whispering] Christine's asleep.
-Who the fuck is Christine? -My girlfriend. She lives here too.
translation.fr:
- Qui est Christine ?
- Ma petite amie. Elle vit ici aussi.

translation.en: Your-- Is she gonna mind me being here?
translation.fr: Ça la dérange que je sois là ?

translation.en: No, no, no. I mean... -No, I'm sure it'll be fine. -[chuckles]
translation.fr: Non, je suis sûr que ça ira.

translation.en: I mean, you get along with everybody, right?
translation.fr: Tu t'entends avec tout le monde, non ?

translation.en: You said, you'd never come to L.A.
translation.fr:
Tu as dit que
tu ne viendrais jamais à L.A.

translation.en: Guess I changed my mind.
Your actress friend didn't wanna come?
translation.fr: Ton amie actrice ne voulait pas venir ?

translation.en: Something happen in the woods?
translation.fr: Quelque chose s'est passé dans les bois ?

translation.en: You know. People tend to get fucked up around me.
translation.fr: Je fous en l'air ceux qui m'entourent.

translation.en: Not me.
You want this?
-Nah, I'm good. -Thank you.
-Night. -Goodnight.
-So you used to date my boyfriend. -I wouldn't say date exactly.
translation.fr:
- Tu sortais avec mon petit ami donc.
- Pas vraiment.

translation.en: It looked like you were sleeping with your eyes open. It was gross.
translation.fr:
On aurait dit que tu dormais
les yeux ouverts. C'était dégueu.

translation.en: Sorry.
So he said you might need to crash here for a minute or so,
translation.fr:
Il a dit que tu dormirais ici
une minute ou deux,

translation.en: and I'm totally good with that if you do.
Just... If you wanna take a shower,
translation.fr: Si tu veux prendre une douche,

translation.en: use the hallway bathroom, not the one by our bedroom.
translation.fr:
utilise la salle de bain du couloir,
pas celle de notre chambre.

translation.en: And sometimes when you pull the thingy for the shower,
translation.fr:
Et parfois, quand on tire le truc
pour la douche,

translation.en: seems like nothing's gonna happen, and then it goes, like, ca-chunk!
translation.fr:
on dirait que rien ne va se passer,
et tout à coup...

translation.en: And then... Pssh! Like, it spits right in your eye.
Are you, like, an actress or something?
Filmmaker.
Good for you.
It's a very tough town.
It takes years just to get a break.
translation.fr: Ça prend des années avant que ça marche.

translation.en: What do you do?
I'm in real estate.
Morning.
-[Christine] Hey, babe. [chuckles] -[Code] Hey.
Get off your butt, Lis. Don't you have that meeting with Lou Burke?
translation.fr:
Lève-toi Lis. T'as pas une entrevue
avec Lou Burke ?

translation.en: [Christine] Lou Burke?
[Lisa] Mr. Burke.
Lisa Nova.
Jesus, you're not much older than my son.
translation.fr:
Vous n'êtes pas beaucoup
plus vieux que mon fils.

translation.en: Sit. [clears throat]
And call me Lou. Never Mr. Burke.
Okay. Lou. How'd you get my short film?
translation.fr: Lou. Vous avez aimé mon court métrage ?

translation.en: I sent it to a few people, but--
translation.fr: Je l'ai envoyé à quelques personnes...

translation.en: You know those nights you wake up every 20 minutes from a different dream?
translation.fr:
Il vous arrive de vous réveiller toutes
les 20 min d'un rêve différent ?

translation.en: My wife thinks I should see a sleep guy, but I love my dreams.
translation.fr:
Ma femme dit que je devrais voir
un spécialiste, mais j'aime mes rêves.

translation.en: I dream about the birds. Oh, hello. Thank you.
Falcons, actually.
I raise Arctic Peregrines. Like nature's 200-mile-an-hour missile.
translation.fr:
J'élève des faucons pèlerins
Un missile volant à 320 km/h.

translation.en: I had three, but one killed Glenn Close's Pekingese,
translation.fr:
J'en avais trois, mais l'un d'eux a tué
le pékinois de Glenn Close,

translation.en: and now I've got two. Thank you.
translation.fr: et maintenant j'en ai deux. Merci.

translation.en: You're having coffee with sushi.
translation.fr: Vous prenez du café avec des sushis.

translation.en: I drink this coffee with everything. Comayagua!
translation.fr: Je bois ce café avec tout. Comayagua !

translation.en: Ship it in from Honduras.
My assistant makes sure my favorite spots have it on hand.
translation.fr:
Mon assistante s'assure
que ce soit toujours disponible.

translation.en: -Very cool. So-- -What's your story?
translation.fr:
- Très cool. Alors...
- Racontez un peu.

translation.en: Not from L.A., I take it.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas de L.A., je pense.

translation.en: No, I'm from Brazil, actually.
My father is a botanist. He was looking for corpse vines--
translation.fr:
Mon père est botaniste.
Il y cherchait des plantes grimpantes...

translation.en: I feel like you're flicking puzzle pieces at me.
translation.fr:
J'ai l'impression que vous me jetez
des pièces de puzzle.

translation.en: -He was looking for a corpse vine? -What are we doing here?
translation.fr:
- Plante grimpante ?
- Qu'est-ce qu'on fait ici ?

translation.en: I wanted to meet you.
That's how meetings work.
[in English] Japanese scallops.
[sighs] I saw a tape sitting on a desk and...
translation.fr: J'ai vu une cassette sur un bureau et...

translation.en: I don't know. I had this voice in my head.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas.
J'avais une voix dans la tête.

translation.en: "Pick up this video tape.
Pick it up."
It's a true story.
That sound crazy? Probably does.
So you liked my movie.
[Lou] So, what do we got?
It's tense.
And scary.
And, um...
My God, that ending.
I mean, those special effects when she...
Well, I don't wanna get too gory over lunch.
translation.fr: Je veux pas parler de sang au déjeuner.

translation.en: So the question is what's the full-length,
translation.fr: Une version longue aurait quelle durée

translation.en: major-motion-picture, opens-on-1500-screens-nationwide version?
translation.fr:
pour pouvoir la montrer
sur 1500 écrans nationaux ?

translation.en: Well, what it's really about, to me, is...
this woman.
She's got this thing. But she doesn't know how to use it yet.
translation.fr:
Elle possède un truc mais ne sait pas
comment s'en servir.

translation.en: Like a superpower. Right? Her eyes already do that thing.
translation.fr:
Comme un superpouvoir.
Ses yeux font déjà un truc.

translation.en: Yeah, but other people wanna take it from her.
translation.fr:
Oui, mais les autres
veulent le lui prendre.

translation.en: They wanna suck her dry and don't care if they kill her in the process.
translation.fr: Et ils s'en fichent si ça la tue.

translation.en: So this woman, she has to learn how to use this thing against them.
translation.fr:
Alors elle doit apprendre à utiliser
cette chose contre eux.

translation.en: If she wants to make it out alive.
translation.fr: Si elle veut s'en sortir vivante.

translation.en: -Okay. -It's a paranoid thriller.
Woman on the run. Right? I've been looking for something like this.
translation.fr:
Une femme en fuite ?
Je cherchais quelque chose comme ça.

translation.en: Okay, so let's do a director wish list. Right?
I'm directing.
I mean, a rookie director is a tough sell.
translation.fr:
Une novice,
c'est difficile à faire passer.

translation.en: You'd have to sell yourself as a...
young female Cronenberg, uh...
Verhoeven.
Truth is, I've been looking to take more chances.
translation.fr: Je cherche à prendre des risques.

translation.en: You know, maybe you're the chance I've been looking to take.
But you need to learn to persuade people that you're the one to make this.
translation.fr:
Mais tu dois apprendre à persuader
les gens que tu es celle qu'il faut.

translation.en: So you'll help me out.
That's great.
And that's the thing.
Not everything can be taught. Some things have to be experienced...
translation.fr:
On ne peut pas tout apprendre.
ll faut aussi acquérir une expérience...

translation.en: Holy fucking shit. Roy Hardaway?
Is that Roy-fucking-Hardaway? Oh, my God! It is!
translation.fr:
C'est Roy Hardaway ?
Mon Dieu ! C'est lui !

translation.en: -How's it going, Lou? Good to see you. -How the fuck are ya, huh?
translation.fr:
- Comment ça va, Lou ?
- Comment ça va ?

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, Roy, this is Lisa Nova. Lisa Nova, Roy Hardaway.
translation.fr: Voici Lisa Nova. Lisa Nova, Roy Hardaway.

translation.en: The actor.
I know who he is. Hi.
[Lou] You gotta try the monkfish liver. It's next-level.
translation.fr:
Il faut essayer le foie de lotte.
C'est autre chose.

translation.en: It's mind blowing, like having a woman undress in your mouth.
translation.fr:
C'est comme si une femme
se déshabillait dans ta bouche.

translation.en: Am I gonna see you at the Alvin Sender...?
translation.fr: On se voit au truc d'Alvin Sender...

translation.en: [Roy] Not sure yet. I haven't decided.
-[Roy] It was nice to meet you, Lisa. -Yes. You too.
translation.fr:
- Ravi de t'avoir rencontrée, Lisa.
- Pareillement.

translation.en: So I'm assuming this is you?
translation.fr: Je suppose que c'est à toi ?

translation.en: Yes, that's me.
-You living out of this thing? -Actually, yes, I am.
translation.fr:
- Tu vis dans ce truc ?
- En fait, oui.

translation.en: Jesus.
Home sweet home.
Tell you what.
I'm gonna option your short.
translation.fr: Je vais prendre une option sur ton court.

translation.en: We'll make the feature just the way you want it.
translation.fr: On fera le film comme tu le veux.

translation.en: Consider this a deposit.
I'll send over a contract. Have a lawyer look it over.
translation.fr:
Je t'enverrai un contrat.
Demande à un avocat de vérifier.

translation.en: -[engine starts] -Consider an apartment.
Why?
Do you want?
Oh, no, thank you. I'm not hungry, but thanks.
translation.fr: Non, merci. Je n'ai pas faim, mais merci.

translation.en: When the bandages come off, she'll look like Daryl Hannah.
translation.fr:
Une fois les bandages enlevés,
elle ressemblera à Daryl Hannah.

translation.en: Cher wasn't built in a day.
translation.fr: Cher n'a pas été faite en un jour.

translation.en: So is it legit?
Nothing seems shady.
You should get a lawyer.
[Lisa] I can't afford one.
translation.fr: Je n'en ai pas les moyens.

translation.en: Jules says it looks legit.
translation.fr: Jules dit que ça a l'air réglo.

translation.en: Well, if Jules Brandenberg says so.
I know what a contract looks like. I have a movie in development.
translation.fr:
Je sais à quoi ressemble un contrat.
J'ai un film en cours.

translation.en: -He directed our video, babe. -Meaningless.
translation.fr:
- Il a réalisé notre vidéo.
- Sans importance.

translation.en: You're gonna be huge, baby.
[mouths] Thank you.
Lou Burke. Wow.
He hasn't had a hit in a few years, but I love Breaking Point.
translation.fr:
Il n'a pas eu de succès depuis quelques
années, mais j'adore Breaking Point.

translation.en: Good for you.
Thanks. So does the contract protect me as the director?
translation.fr:
Merci. Le contrat me protège
en tant que réalisatrice ?

translation.en: Can I be fired?
No producer hires a director they can't replace if the director sucks.
translation.fr:
N'importe quel producteur peut virer
un réalisateur qui est nul.

translation.en: In theory, they could fire Steven Spielberg if they want to.
translation.fr:
En théorie, ils pourraient virer
Steven Spielberg s'ils le voulaient.

translation.en: But, yeah,
this says, you, Lisa Natasha Nova, are directing the movie.
translation.fr:
tu es bien Lisa Natasha Nova,
la réalisatrice du film.

translation.en: Just don't suck.
translation.fr: Ne sois pas nulle, c'est tout.

translation.en: You think I could meet him?
translation.fr: Tu crois que je pourrais le rencontrer ?

translation.en: [Christine] It's kind of a shithole, but you can't afford anything that isn't.
translation.fr:
C'est un trou à rats,
mais tu peux pas t'offrir mieux.

translation.en: The great news is it's furnished.
Or someone abandoned the furniture in here.
translation.fr: Ou quelqu'un a abandonné les meubles.

translation.en: But either way, you can use it.
translation.fr: En tout cas, tu peux les utiliser.

translation.en: I love this place.
Careful at night. There's coyotes all around here.
translation.fr:
Attention la nuit.
Il y a des coyotes tout autour.

translation.en: -There's whats? -Coyotes.
translation.fr:
- Il y a quoi ?
- Des coyotes.

translation.en: They're fucking dangerous.
Feels kinda haunted.
Maybe you'll hear some silent film actress sobbing all night.
translation.fr:
Tu entendras peut-être une actrice
du muet pleurer toute la nuit.

translation.en: Maybe she slit her wrists in the clawfoot tub.
translation.fr:
Elle s'est peut être tranché les veines
dans la baignoire à pied en griffe.

translation.en: [Christine] Not a clawfoot.
I always wanted a penthouse.
[Christine] The top floor of a walkup is not a penthouse.
translation.fr:
Le dernier étage d'un immeuble
sans ascenseur n'est pas un penthouse.

translation.en: [whispers] Coyotes.
[Lou] So let's talk about Lisa Nova.
Can you sell me Lisa Nova?
You mean sell my movie idea?
No, actually, I don't. Everybody's got an idea.
translation.fr: En fait, non. Tout le monde a une idée.

translation.en: There's only one you.
So who are you?
Sell yourself to me.
So, I'm sure you hear this all the time, but I'm not like every other director.
translation.fr:
Tu dois l'entendre tout le temps,
je suis pas comme les autres réalisateurs.

translation.en: Oh, you're not?
I witness a murder. Right?
I saw the guy. Got a good look at him. Now all the cops are standing around,
translation.fr:
J'ai bien vu le type.
Maintenant tous les flics sont là,

translation.en: the sketch artist has her pad and her pencils,
translation.fr: le portraitiste a son bloc et ses crayons,

translation.en: and everyone's waiting with bated breath and I say,
translation.fr:
et tout le monde attend
avec impatience, et je dis :

translation.en: "The killer was not like a jellyfish."
translation.fr:
"Le tueur ne ressemblait pas
à une méduse."

translation.en: -Don't tell me what you're not. -Copy that.
translation.fr:
- Ne me dis pas ce que tu n'es pas.
- Très bien.

translation.en: Don't worry, you're still young. We'll keep going until we get it right.
translation.fr: T'en fais pas. Tu es jeune. On continuera jusqu'à ce que tu y arrives.

translation.en: ♪ Even the air in here has jelled ♪
-[Lou] You okay? You look tired. -[Lisa] I didn't get much sleep.
translation.fr:
- Ça va ? Tu as l'air fatigué.
- Je n'ai pas beaucoup dormi.

translation.en: [Lou] Go again. Go.
I grew up loving movies.
translation.fr: J'ai grandi en aimant les films.

translation.en: When I was a kid, in São Conrado, my dad had a projector,
translation.fr:
Quand j'étais petite, à São Conrado,
mon père avait un projecteur,

translation.en: -and I used to watch-- -Let me tell you about a guy.
translation.fr:
- et je regardais...
- Je vais te parler d'un mec.

translation.en: His name's Alvin Sender, and he's rich as sin.
translation.fr:
Il s'appelle Alvin Sender,
et il est riche comme Crésus.

translation.en: What makes him unique is he loves finding new talent.
translation.fr:
Ce qui le rend unique, c'est qu'il adore
trouver de nouveaux talents.

translation.en: You know the Sex, Lies, and Videotape kid? Alvin's financing his next project.
translation.fr:
Sexe, Mensonge et Vidéo, tu vois ?
Alvin produit le prochain film du type.

translation.en: Problem is a lot of people ask Alvin for money.
translation.fr:
Le problème, c'est que beaucoup de gens
demandent de l'argent à Alvin.

translation.en: And believe me when I tell you, they all grew up loving movies.
translation.fr:
Et crois-moi quand je te le dis,
ils ont tous grandi en aimant les films.

translation.en: So, what makes you different?
translation.fr: Alors, qu'est-ce qui te rend différente ?

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not good at this whole pitching myself thing.
translation.fr:
Peut-être que je ne suis pas douée
pour parler de moi.

translation.en: When I was a kid, I was in a really bad accident.
translation.fr: Enfant, j'ai eu un grave accident.

translation.en: Stuck in a bed for the better part of a year.
translation.fr: Coincé dans un lit pendant presque un an.

translation.en: Worst part, I couldn't go to the movies.
translation.fr:
Le pire, c'est que je ne pouvais pas
aller au cinéma.

translation.en: And a movie theater was my church, it was everything to me.
translation.fr:
Et un cinéma était mon église,
c'était tout pour moi.

translation.en: So I'd have to imagine the movies I wanted to see, beginning to end.
translation.fr:
Il fallait que j'imagine les films
que je voulais voir, du début à la fin.

translation.en: But to this day, I firmly believe
that accident is the only reason I have three Oscars to polish.
translation.fr:
que cet accident est la seule raison
pour laquelle j'ai eu trois Oscars.

translation.en: Because I had a North Star.
translation.fr: Parce que j'avais une Étoile polaire.

translation.en: Would that kid in that hospital bed wanna see this movie?
translation.fr:
Et ce gamin dans le lit de l'hôpital
qui voulait voir un film ?

translation.en: That kid was my audience.
Who's yours?
Let's go for a drive.
translation.fr: Viens, on va faire un tour.

translation.en: What are you thinking about?
My mom.
What about her?
You asked who my audience is.
translation.fr: Tu as demandé qui était mon public.

translation.en: [Lou] She must be an interesting lady.
[Lisa] I wouldn't know.
Never met her.
She left right after I was born.
translation.fr: Elle est partie juste après ma naissance.

translation.en: I know what I'm about to say is gonna sound crazy.
translation.fr:
Je sais que ce que je vais dire
va paraître fou.

translation.en: Actually never said it out loud before but...
translation.fr:
Je l'ai jamais dit
à voix haute avant mais...

translation.en: I feel like if I can make my film,
translation.fr:
j'ai l'impression que si
je peux faire mon film...

translation.en: somehow, she'll see it.
And she'll know it came from me.
translation.fr: Elle saura que je l'ai fait.

translation.en: That's beautiful.
You know, I could walk this into a studio a lot easier without you,
translation.fr:
Tu sais, je pourrais me rendre
à un studio plus facilement sans toi,

translation.en: or take it to Alvin with some hotshot music video director,
translation.fr:
ou en parler à Alvin
avec un réalisateur connu de clips...

translation.en: but it's about relevance.
translation.fr: mais c'est une question de pertinence.

translation.en: You know?
You only get so many bites at the apple.
A year in this business is like a decade, and I haven't...
translation.fr:
Un an dans ce business est comme
une décennie, et je n'ai pas...

translation.en: I haven't had a real hit since 1986.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas eu de succès depuis 1986.

translation.en: I don't wanna know what it's like to disappear.
translation.fr:
Je veux pas savoir
ce que disparaître veut dire.

translation.en: I need you.
That's the truth.
So Saturday night, Alvin Sender's having a thing at his gallery.
translation.fr:
Samedi soir, Alvin Sender présente
un truc dans sa galerie.

translation.en: Movie people, movie stars.
translation.fr: Avec les gens et les stars du cinéma.

translation.en: Be a great opportunity to meet Alvin.
translation.fr: Ce serait l'occasion de rencontrer Alvin.

translation.en: It's a date.
[Lou] Well, this should be fun.
We're going as a team.
I'll build you up, get Alvin on your side.
translation.fr:
Je vais te préparer,
mettre Alvin de ton côté.

translation.en: And then when you have the official meeting,
he'll know who you are. Right?
And then when you walk out of that meeting, you'll have a movie.
translation.fr:
Et en sortant de l'entrevue,
tu auras un film.

translation.en: Thanks.
Whatever happens, thanks for everything.
translation.fr: Quoi qu'il arrive, merci pour tout.

translation.en: [Lou] My pleasure.
I think we make a good team.
I'm sorry. I thought, um...
I'm sorry.
I think we make a good team too.
translation.fr: Oui, on forme une bonne équipe.

translation.en: What's Alvin Sender look like?
[Lou] Like a rich guy.
You know, the masks read your brain waves and turn them into these little movies.
translation.fr:
Les masques décodent tes ondes cérébrales
et les transforment en petits films.

translation.en: Stay here and look cool.
[Roy] Lisa Nova.
Here you are.
This thing creeps me out.
I know it's bullshit, but I don't want the world to have a window into my mind.
translation.fr:
C'est des conneries, mais je veux pas
que le monde découvre mes pensées.

translation.en: [Lisa] I love it.
What would somebody see if they looked through your window?
translation.fr:
Et qu'est-ce qu'on verrait
dans ton esprit ?

translation.en: I guess it depends on who's looking.
You know that woman?
She's been watching you since you've walked in.
translation.fr: Elle t'observe depuis que tu es arrivée.

translation.en: She's probably trying to figure out where you are in the food chain.
translation.fr:
Elle doit essayer de savoir
où tu es dans la chaîne alimentaire.

translation.en: See you around, maybe.
I've been waiting for the right moment to say hello.
translation.fr:
J'attendais le bon moment
pour dire bonjour.

translation.en: Do you know me?
The man you came in with is having a very important conversation without you.
translation.fr:
L'homme avec qui vous êtes venue a
une conversation importante sans vous.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Boro.
What do you want?
To offer my services.
What is it you do?
For you? I could hurt someone.
translation.fr:
Pour vous ? Je pourrais faire du mal
à quelqu'un.

translation.en: How?
Will you hold my cat?
-Uh... -Here. Aww....
Okay, baby.
Sometimes, I imagine I'm inside him like he's a house.
translation.fr:
Parfois, j'imagine être en lui
comme s'il était une maison.

translation.en: You could do that.
Imagine you're inside someone. Say, the man you came here with.
translation.fr:
Imaginez être à l'intérieur de quelqu'un.
Comme l'homme avec qui vous êtes venue.

translation.en: -Inside of him? -Yes.
Imagine that.
Like he's a house and you're wandering around.
translation.fr: Il est une maison, et vous vous y baladez.

translation.en: Are you doing it?
No. No, you're not.
translation.fr: Non, vous ne le faites pas.

translation.en: Imagine...
that you're inside him.
You feel it?
Now, break something.
Done.
-[cat meows] -Oh, yes. I know.
I know.
Here.
I'm at Cortez and Maribel in Boyle Heights.
translation.fr:
Je vis au croisement de Cortez et Maribel
à Boyle Heights.

translation.en: Come find me. There's no number,
translation.fr: Venez me trouver. Il n'y a pas de numéro,

translation.en: but you'll know it by the white jaguar out front.
translation.fr:
mais le jaguar blanc devant
vous indiquera l'endroit.

translation.en: Bring my cat.
[Lisa] You just took it.
[Lou] I found Alvin.
Taking a piss next to me, can you believe it?
translation.fr:
Il pissait à côté de moi,
incroyable, non ?

translation.en: The john, man.
Brings everybody together.
-What happened? -Mm.
Craziest thing. We're talking,
and all of a sudden, my nose starts gushing blood,
translation.fr:
et tout à coup,
mon nez a commencé à saigner

translation.en: like a faucet.
And I haven't done blow since like '85.
translation.fr: Et je n'ai rien sniffé depuis 1985.

translation.en: I promised my wife. Thank you. [clears throat]
translation.fr: J'avais promis à ma femme. Merci.

translation.en: [Lisa] So, where is Alvin now?
Oh, he left. He was on his way out.
translation.fr: Il est parti. Il s'en allait.

translation.en: Oh, shit, he left. I didn't even get to--
translation.fr: Merde, il est parti. J'ai même pas pu...

translation.en: Lisa, relax.
I talked to him.
He's in.
What, just now? In the bathroom? Without watching the short?
translation.fr:
À l'instant ? Dans les toilettes ?
Sans regarder le court ?

translation.en: My word's good for him.
Told you we make a great team.
translation.fr: Je l'avais dit, on forme une bonne équipe.

translation.en: And he knows I'm directing?
translation.fr: Et il sait que je réalise ?

translation.en: Lisa, Jesus!
What do you do when you get bad news?
translation.fr:
Comment tu réagis
aux mauvaises nouvelles ?

translation.en: It's good.
He's in, I talked to him.
translation.fr: Il est partant, je lui ai parlé.

translation.en: You're welcome.
[Lisa] Why are we stopping?
I think your mother's gonna be proud of you.
translation.fr: Je crois que ta mère va être fière de toi.

translation.en: What? [grunts]
Nice.
Push in, push in, push in...
Cut.
Get off!
What? What's the problem?
Misread. [laughs]
You coming?
Like to walk. Okay. All right.
Enjoy the view.
[Boro] Bring my cat.
Now, break something.
I could hurt someone.
Bring my cat.
[gasps] What the fuck!
Code!
Jesus fucking Christ, you're like a fucking serial killer.
translation.fr:
Putain de merde, t'es comme
un putain de tueur en série.

translation.en: I knocked. You didn't hear me? Your door was open.
translation.fr:
J'ai frappé. Tu m'as pas entendu ?
Ta porte était ouverte.

translation.en: I just-- I wanted to see how you were doing with this whole...
translation.fr:
Je voulais voir
comment ça se passe va avec

translation.en: Jules Brandenberg thing.
What Jules Brandenberg thing?
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce qui se passe
avec Jules Brandenberg ?

translation.en: I mean, even he feels weird about it.
translation.fr: Même lui pense que c'est bizarre.

translation.en: What's he feel weird about?
Meeting with Lou.
What's he meeting with Lou for?
To direct your movie.
I thought you knew.
-He's expecting me. -[gasps]
Excuse me! Who are you?
Meet my son, Jonathan, the artist. He's taking a semester off.
translation.fr:
Voici mon fils, Jonathan, l'artiste.
Il prend un semestre de congé.

translation.en: Uh... And this is my falcon, Maverick.
Do not mess with this guy. Look at that face.
translation.fr: Ne l'embête pas. Regarde ce visage.

translation.en: No sense of humor.
Can we talk in private?
Why am I hearing that Jules Brandenberg is up to direct my film?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi j'entends que Jules Brandenberg
est prêt à réaliser mon film ?

translation.en: Hey! I direct!
-We talked about this! -You know precocial animals?
translation.fr:
- On en a parlé !
- Tu connais les animaux nidifuge ?

translation.en: -What the fuck? -[Lou] Giraffes are an example.
Right after they're born, they stand up.
translation.fr: Juste après leur naissance, ils se lèvent.

translation.en: Covered in placenta and everything. They're all wet and wobbly.
translation.fr:
Couverts de placenta,
ils sont mouillés et chancelants.

translation.en: They don't know what walking is,
translation.fr: Ils ne savent pas ce qu'est marcher,

translation.en: but they're trying so damn hard to do it anyway.
translation.fr: mais ils essaient vraiment d'y arriver.

translation.en: I'm not gonna give you the rights to my film if I'm not directing it.
translation.fr:
Je ne te donnerai pas les droits
de mon film si je ne le réalise pas.

translation.en: Do you know what you signed?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que tu as signé ?

translation.en: No.
You don't know what you signed.
Learn to walk before you try to run.
translation.fr: Apprends à marcher avant de courir.

translation.en: You know? Remember, this is still a very big deal for you.
translation.fr:
N'oublie pas, c'est toujours
une bonne affaire pour pour toi.

translation.en: We had an agreement.
We do have one. We signed it.
translation.fr: On en a un. On l'a signé.

translation.en: Lou.
Sometimes, you want a filet mignon, and you get a Dodger Dog instead.
translation.fr:
Parfois, on veut un filet mignon,
et on a un hot-dog à la place.

translation.en: But Dodger Dogs are delicious.
You made a promise.
I did make you a promise. And we do have an agreement.
translation.fr:
Je t'ai fait une promesse.
Et nous avons un accord.

translation.en: Have a seat.
This business, this banquet
we're all feeding our bellies at,
it's made up of promises and agreements.
translation.fr: est fait de promesses et d'accords.

translation.en: The problem is, you're still learning the difference between them.
translation.fr:
Le problème est que tu es en train
d'apprendre la différence entre eux.

translation.en: And a promise is an hors d'oeuvre.
You know, it's an appetizer that gets passed around.
translation.fr: C'est un apéritif qu'on fait circuler.

translation.en: "Bacon wrapped date? Thank you, I'd love one."
Then we sit down for the main course. The meat.
translation.fr: Puis on a le plat principal. La viande.

translation.en: That's the agreement.
And you...
ate it.
What changed?
I'm not the bad guy.
I know you want me to be. I understand that.
translation.fr:
Je sais que tu le vois ainsi.
Je comprends.

translation.en: But this world we live in is predators and prey.
translation.fr:
Mais on vit dans un monde
de prédateurs et de proies.

translation.en: And each and every one of us is both.
translation.fr: Et chacun de nous est les deux.

translation.en: Say it.
I gotta hear you say it.
What changed?
All right. And you're an artist, right? So it's all material. Use it.
translation.fr:
Tu es une artiste, oui ?
Tout est du matériel. Sers-t'en.

translation.en: Maybe this is news to you, but art is violent, man.
translation.fr:
Tu le sais peut-être pas,
mais l'art est violent.

translation.en: It's selfish. I mean, I-- I thought you knew that.
translation.fr:
C'est égoïste.
Je pensais que tu le savais.

translation.en: "Written and directed by Lisa Nova."
Are you gonna tell me you've never used anybody
translation.fr:
Parce que tu n'as jamais profité
de quelqu'un

translation.en: for the sake of making something?
That there's nobody out there who'd say, "Lisa Nova is selfish"?
translation.fr:
Qu'il n'y a personne qui dirait :
"Lisa Nova est égoïste" ?

translation.en: I wanna hear you say it.
What are you punishing me for?
I think we've said enough.
Is that your wife out there?
What's--? What's her name? I could talk to her.
translation.fr:
Comment elle s'appelle ?
Je pourrais lui parler.

translation.en: Oh, you don't want me to talk to your wife.
translation.fr: Tu n'aimerais pas que je lui parle.

translation.en: Think.
Very carefully.
Let this be a learning experience.
translation.fr:
Que ce soit une expérience
d'apprentissage.

translation.en: [Lisa] You're gonna regret it.
[Lou] Lisa?
Rewind!
I can't have you leaving here all upset.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas te laisser partir
dans cet état.

translation.en: I feel like I left the campsite in worse shape than I found it,
translation.fr:
C'est comme laisser le campement
dans un état pire qu'à l'arrivée,

translation.en: which is a major Boy Scout no-no.
What?
Look, there is a reality where you have a very long career.
translation.fr:
Il y a une réalité
où tu as une très longue carrière.

translation.en: Okay, but one of the skills you're going to need...
translation.fr:
Mais l'une des compétences
dont tu auras besoin...

translation.en: is the ability to apologize.
You want me to apologize to you?
You just came into my home uninvited.
translation.fr: Tu es venue sans être invitée.

translation.en: And you threatened me.
You can't even admit you took my movie,
translation.fr:
Tu peux même pas admettre
que tu as volé mon film,

translation.en: because you're a fucking washed-up fucking--
translation.fr: parce que tu es un has been...

translation.en: What did you say?
What am I? Say it again. Say it again.
translation.fr: Je suis quoi ? Répète un peu.

translation.en: You know what you are?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que tu es ?

translation.en: You're a fucking nothing. You're a million fucking wannabes.
translation.fr:
Tu n'es personne. Vous êtes un million
de putain d'ambitieux.

translation.en: I see it every fucking day.
translation.fr: Je le vois tous les jours.

translation.en: Bet your mother saw the same thing in you.
translation.fr:
Je parie que ta mère a vu
la même chose en toi.

translation.en: Just a meaningless fucking void!
Get the fuck out of my driveway before I call the cops.
translation.fr:
Dégage de mon allée
avant que j'appelle les flics.

translation.en: You said you could hurt someone for me.
translation.fr:
Vous avez dit pouvoir faire du mal
à quelqu'un pour moi.

translation.en: Is that true?
Where's my cat?
I didn't bring your cat.
Can you help me?
What did he do to you?
[Lisa] He betrayed me.
So what? It happens.
[Lisa] No.
He took the only thing I care about.
translation.fr:
Il a pris la seule chose
à laquelle je tiens.

translation.en: So...
Whatever it is you do,
I want you to do it.
To him.
As long as you can pay my rate.
translation.fr: Tant que tu peux payer mon tarif.

translation.en: I'll pay you whatever you want.
translation.fr: Je paierai ce que vous voulez.

translation.en: [Boro] Great.
I'll take the first payment upfront.
Do you know how special you are?
translation.fr: Tu sais comme tu es spéciale ?

translation.en: Do you?
You have something inside you.
translation.fr: Tu as quelque chose en toi.

translation.en: It's tasty.
It's always been there.
Your stuff, your substance.
It's the beginning of all of your thoughts.
translation.fr: C'est le début de tes pensées.

translation.en: And it wants to be born.
You can keep the other cat.
Do we have a deal?
Say what you want.
Say it.
I want my movie back.
And I want to set his life on fire.
translation.fr: Et je veux ruiner sa vie.

translation.en: -[cat meows] -We can do that.
